Text: My God! This is AWESOME! Just perfect! I'm from Brasil and went to this show in Sao Paulo... that was amazing, simply the best show/event and day of my life! Still thinkig about the show untill now. THANKS for this video. The quality is awesome, HD really perfect. Audio is great too. Watched from my Samsung Led D7000 46', running direct from my PC via Serviio. Incredible! Mp4 format is awesome! Congratulations! THANKS! Regards from Brazil!
